name: Greninja
evolution: Level 1 Froakie, Level 5 Frogadier, Level 7 Greninja

passive.name: Torrent
passive.description: When the Pokemon is at half HP or less, its damage and movement speed are increased.

basic attack.description: Becomes a boosted attack every third attack. Hitting from a distance increases damage and reduces opponent's movement speed. If hit from a close range, the damage inflicted is based on the target's maximum HP.

base.name: Bubble
base.description: Attacks with a spray of bubbles, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time when it hits.

upgrade.description: Increases the number of times this move attacks.

upgrades.name: Water Shuriken
upgrades.description: Throws shurikens made of water in quick succession. Increases the user's movement speed while they are using this move and restores the user's HP every time a shuriken hits.

upgrade.description: Increases the amount of HP restored.

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description: Has the user ride a wave, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon and restoring the user's HP. If this move knocks out an opposing Pokemon, its cooldown is reset.

base.name: Subsitute
base.description: Levaes behind a substitute for the user while they're moving forward.

upgrades.name: Double Team
upgrades.description: Quickly moves the user away from the current position, creating illusory copies of them to aid in battle.

upgrade.description: Increases Attack for a short time when the user stops sneaking.

upgrades.name: Smoke Screen
upgrades.description: Rolls in the aimed direction while leaving a smoke screen behind. The next main attack will also be greatly enhanced.

unite.name: Waterburst Shuriken
unite.description: Has the user jump to the designated area and attack opposing Pokemon in the area of effect with a giant water shuriken.
